content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once your ELC account is created, you will have an \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"estee.com\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" email address (e.g., dzhutov@estee.com).  While you are permitted to send emails to/from your EPAM mailbox, it is preferred to use your estee account for communicating with the client.  It is not recommended to transfer any docs though. I personally forward all meeting invites sent to Estee to my EPAM account so that I do not miss any meetings. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Web version: ELC Outlook: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://outlook.office.com/mail/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://outlook.office.com/mail/ \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How to configure desktop Outlook to see both your inboxes - EPAM and ESTEE. Open\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \\\"File\\\" -> \\\"+ Add Account\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and add your Estee email address, once you have it:\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Step 1\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":40617,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c212d23d-2e7c-4b05-84d6-aff999109df2/Step 1.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c212d23d-2e7c-4b05-84d6-aff999109df2/Step 1.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Step 1.PNG\",\"name\":\"Step 1.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c212d23d-2e7c-4b05-84d6-aff999109df2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":522,\"height\":225},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Step 2\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":18556,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/60a24104-3ea2-4458-8efd-13cc10b6302d/Step 2.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/60a24104-3ea2-4458-8efd-13cc10b6302d/Step 2.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Step 2.PNG\",\"name\":\"Step 2.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"60a24104-3ea2-4458-8efd-13cc10b6302d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":519,\"height\":164},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
